descriptionHTML:
Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" watch face for Android Wear smartwatches: Huawei Watch, Sony SmartWatch, Motorola Moto 360, Tag Heuer, Fossil Q, LG G Watch, Asus ZenWatch etc. Stylish & Elegant. This watchface is compatible with all Android Wear watches. Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" Watch Face for all Star Wars lovers! All Star Wars heroes in one watch face. Install Star Wars Watch Face & choose your side.

All Star Wars heroes in one application!
Pay once and enjoy constant updates and new characters no limits.

FEATURES of Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" Watch Face - complete guide:
✔ Watchface compatible with all Android Wear Watches:
* Motorola Moto 360,
* Motorola Moto 360 2nd,
* LG G Watch R,
* LG G Watch,
* LG Urban,
* LG Urban 2nd,
* Sony SmartWatch 3,
* Samsung Gear Live,
* Huawei Watch,
* Asus ZenWatch,
etc.

✔ Support both round and square displays
You can choose display format (round or square) in the theme settings.

✔ 24-hour time format
You can choose time format in watchface settings (24-hour, 12-hour, without leading zeros).

✔ Day of the week
✔ Day of the month
There is different formats of date display in application.

✔ Several themes.
There is several different background themes in watch face:
* Leia Organa,
* Padme Amidala,
* Shaak Ti,
* Aayla Secura.
All themes are full HD quality. Collection of watch faces background themes will be updated constantly. Pay once & enjoy different Star Wars heroes no limits.

✔ Ambient mode
You can choose different displya format in Ambient mode of watch face:
* Full watch face
* Simple Digital
* Simple Analog

Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" Watch Face certainly will not leave you indifferent!

If you have any issues or questions about Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" watch face for Android Wear, fill free to contact us by email or write reviews.

How to use Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" Watch Face for Android Wear smartwatches:
1. Once you install the app, the Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" watchface will be automatically transferred to your watch. This may take a few minutes. You may have to wait for a while.
2. From smartwatches: Long press your watchface and select the one that you have installed.
From mobile: Run the "Android Wear" app and tap "More" button in the watchface section.
3. Enjoy your new Star Wars Pack No.2 "Female Characters" Watch Face for Android Wear!

Follow us:
Google+ : https://plus.google.com/communities/110067937523867264256

More watchfaces:

Visit our exclusive collection on the Play Store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=9182929089273059210

Also please let us know if you like to have any other watchfaces to be added to our selection.
